titles.title: MP837 He Brought Me To His Banqueting Table

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He brought me to His banqueting table, (men-women echo)
He brought me to His banqueting table, (Men-Women echo)
And His banner over me is love. (All)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am my Beloved's and He is mine, (Men-Women echo)
I am my Beloved's and He is mine, (Men-Women echo)
And His banner over me is love. (All)
Yes, His banner over me is love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And we can feel the love of God in this place,
We believe Your goodness, we receive Your grace.
We delight ourselves at Your table, O God,
You do all things well, just look at our lives.
